Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (I've been through several newspapers before the mission.)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (How could I never see this one?)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Is there any good news?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I've never seen this kind of newspaper before.
Speaker.line2: May I ask which newspaper you're reading?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line2: What a hectic day it has been.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line2: This is...

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: The same as the quality of your service.

Choices.Choice1: Ask for an example of news
Choices.Choice2: Ask if there's anything about the bomb

Choices.Choice1: Ask for an example of news
Choices.Choice2: Ask if there's anything about the bomb

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Could you give me one example?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Is there any article about the bomb threat, sir?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Are you being dumb or deaf?
Speaker.line2: I just mentioned itâ€™s none of your concern!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Now, stay the most silent as you can.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Especially when you don't even know how to do your job!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Didn't I just order you to be silent?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: You couldn't even follow a simple order!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: I wonder where you grew up to become such an absolute failure.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line2: That explains your terrible service.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: But I will spare a little for you.
Speaker.line2: Out of pity.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: It is the bomb news in your country.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Taking over like half of today's newspaper!

Choices.Choice1: Ask what does the news say
Choices.Choice2: Ask if it's indeed the work of the spy

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: What does it say?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Is it really the spy's doing?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: I have no business to tell you lower class, do I?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line2: Figure it our yourself!

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: (But he seems to have lost his cool.)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (If he's a Westsider, why does the bomb news make him so irritated?)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: I believe this is far from your concern. No need to worry.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Is there anything concerning you, sir?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh, does the news mention the kind of explosive?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: And you don't deserve to know that!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: No need to be too worried and mess up the meals of other passengers.
Speaker.line2: There's still hope for you Eastsiders.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Which is why I'm not concerned about this at all.
Speaker.line2: I mean, why should I be?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: What a shame that someone like you comes from the same place as me.
Speaker.line2: But whatever.
I'll spare the news with you.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: It's the bomb news from Eastside.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Taking over like half of today's newspaper!

Choices.Choice1: Ask what does the news say
Choices.Choice2: Ask if it's indeed the work of the spy

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Could it really be the work of our spy?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Of course, they even got the name.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: As the rumors from Eastside said, it is our spy.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: (But he seems to have lost his cool.)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (If he's a Westsider, why does the bomb news make him so irritated?)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: I believe this is far from your concern. No need to worry.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Is there anything concerning you, sir?

Choices.Choice3: Ask if the bomb is on the news

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh, does the news mention the kind of explosive?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: You don't deserve to know that!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line2: This %kind% %of% %explosive% can blow up the entire-

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line2: Well, you don't need to know about it.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: And us, Westsiders, need not to be concerned.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line2: Especially on the topic someone of your class have no business with.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: I need a moment to concentrate.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line2: I can't stay calm with this hopeless meal you've brought me!
